SEARCH
Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean

Class ResourceBean

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.bean.ResourceBean
@ApplicationScoped public class ResourceBean extends Object
The ResourceBean class is an application scoped bean that is responsible for managing ResourceEntity instances.

    • ResourceBean

      public ResourceBean()

  • Method Details

    • createDefaultResourcesIfNotExistent

      public void createDefaultResourcesIfNotExistent()
      Creates default resources if they do not already exist in the database.

    • getResourceDetails

      public ResourceTableInfoDto getResourceDetails(int page, String brand, String type, String supplierName, String searchKeyword, String nameAsc, String typeAsc, String brandAsc, String supplierAsc, RejectedIdsDto rejectedIdsDto)
      Retrieves detailed information about resources for display in a paginated table format.
      Parameters:
      page - The page number of the resource table to retrieve.
      brand - The brand filter for the resources.
      type - The type filter for the resources.
      supplierName - The supplier name filter for the resources.
      searchKeyword - The keyword to search within the resources.
      nameAsc - The sorting order for resource names.
      typeAsc - The sorting order for resource types.
      brandAsc - The sorting order for resource brands.
      supplierAsc - The sorting order for resource suppliers.
      rejectedIdsDto - DTO containing IDs of resources to exclude from the result.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing the details of resources for the specified page and filters.

    • calculateMaximumPageTableResources

      public int calculateMaximumPageTableResources(int numberOfResources)
      Calculates the maximum number of pages for the resources table based on the total number of resources.
      Parameters:
      numberOfResources - The total number of resources.
      Returns:
      The maximum number of pages.

    • getAllTypes

      public ArrayList<ResourceTypeENUM> getAllTypes()
      Retrieves all resource types available in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all resource types.

    • getAllBrands

      public List<String> getAllBrands()
      Retrieves all brands associated with resources in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all resource brands.

    • createResource

      public boolean createResource(ResourceCreationDto resourceCreationDto)
      Creates a new resource in the system based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      resourceCreationDto - DTO containing the details of the resource to create.
      Returns:
      true if the resource was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • getResourceFiltersDto

      public ResourceFiltersDto getResourceFiltersDto(boolean withNames, boolean withTypes)
      Retrieves filters for resources, including types, suppliers, brands, and optionally names.
      Parameters:
      withNames - Include resource names in the filters if true.
      withTypes - Include resource types in the filters if true.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing the filters for resources.

    • getResourceById

      public ResourceDto getResourceById(int id)
      Retrieves the details of a resource by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the resource.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing the details of the resource.

    • setResourceDtoSupplier

      public void setResourceDtoSupplier(ResourceDto resourceDto, String supplierName)
      Sets the supplier details in a resource DTO.
      Parameters:
      resourceDto - The resource DTO to update with supplier details.
      supplierName - The name of the supplier.

    • editResource

      public boolean editResource(ResourceDto resourceDto)
      Edits an existing resource in the system based on the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      resourceDto - DTO containing the updated details of the resource.
      Returns:
      true if the resource was successfully updated, false otherwise.

    • updateSupplier

      public void updateSupplier(ResourceDto resourceDto, SupplierEntity supplier)
      Updates the supplier for a resource.
      Parameters:
      resourceDto - The DTO containing the resource and new supplier details.
      supplier - The entity of the new supplier.

    • getProjectResources

      public List<ResourceTableDto> getProjectResources(String projectSystemName)
      Retrieves a list of resources associated with a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectSystemName - The system name of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of DTOs containing the details of resources associated with the project.

    • getResourcesProjectProfile

      public ResourcesProjectProfileDto getResourcesProjectProfile(String sessionId, String projectSystemName)
      Retrieves resources and user role information for a project's profile page.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user requesting the information.
      projectSystemName - The system name of the project.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing resources and user role information for the project.
